about_the_game:
Rev up your imagination and hit the track in Krashimals! Get ready for wacky, fast-paced racing action like you’ve never seen before. In this family-friendly adventure, you’ll take control of adorable animals, such as a daring duck, piloting makeshift go-karts. First up: a cardboard box on wheels—because who needs luxury when you’ve got creativity?

Welcome to Krashimals!

Get ready for an explosive, action-packed party game where chaos and competition collide! In Krashimals, you’ll choose from a wild roster of destructive animals and unleash mayhem in a series of fast-paced, over-the-top battles. Whether you’re playing solo, challenging friends locally, or diving into online multiplayer, every match is a frenzy of fun and destruction.

Key Features:

1. Destructive Animal Combat: Take control of uniquely designed animals from leaping frogs to quacky ducks, no two Krashimals are the same.

2. Chaotic Arenas: Battle across a variety of dynamic arenas filled with hazards, traps, and surprises. Adapt your strategy or get swept away by the chaos!

3. Multiplayer Mayhem: Dominate your friends in local multiplayer or challenge players worldwide in online matches. Victory is sweet, but destruction is sweeter.

4. Customization (Coming Soon!): Express yourself with the upcoming Kart, Wheels and Hat Features! Unlock and equip stylish, silly, or downright bizarre hats for your Krashimals. Look great while causing carnage!

As a solo developer, I’m passionate about creating a fun and chaotic experience. While progress may not be lightning-fast compared to a whole team, I’m dedicated to involving the community's ideas and suggestions to shape the future of Krashimals.

Expect the Unexpected: Krashimals is constantly evolving! Look forward to regular updates with new characters, arenas, modes, and customization features. Buckle up for a wild ride and let the destruction begin!

Are You Ready to Krash? Join the fray and prove that you’ve got what it takes to reign supreme in the ultimate animal brawl!

name: Krashimals

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Krashimals is a chaotic, physics-driven party game where you play as adorable animals and crash into friends for ultimate mayhem! Smash through stylized arenas, challenge modes, use power-ups, and enjoy the fun. Customize your Krashimals hats, karts and wheels and battle to be the last one standing!
